presentationTable.name: Facts - Person Attrition Counts
presentationTable.description: Provides the attrition related metrics based on person counts

presentationColumns.name: Voluntary Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of voluntary worker termination
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.Voluntary Termination Person Count

presentationColumns.name: Involuntary Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of involuntary worker termination
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.Involuntary Termination Person Count

presentationColumns.name: New Hire Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of terminated workers whose years of service is less than an year
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.New Hire Termination Person Count

presentationColumns.name: High Performer Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of terminated workers whose performance rating = High
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.High Performer Termination Person Count

presentationColumns.name: Top Talent Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of terminated workers whose performance rating = High and potential rating = High
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.Top Talent Termination Person Count

presentationColumns.name: YTD Voluntary Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Year To Date Voluntary Termination Count
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.YTD Voluntary Termination Person Count

presentationColumns.name: QTD Voluntary Termination Person Count
presentationColumns.description: Quarter To Date Voluntary Termination Count
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Assignment Event.QTD Voluntary Termination Person Count
